property.name: Back Channel
property.description:
Enable application back channel

Specify whether the application has the mono back channel enabled. For example in a gaming headset

Make sure the VM libraries have been configured for back channel before enabling this feature

property.name: Audio Buffer Size
property.description:
Set audio output buffer size

Set the size of the audio output buffer, measured in number of audio samples not bytes.

Recommended value - 320 words.

property.name: Codec Buffer Size
property.description:
Set codec input buffer size

Set the size of the codec input buffer, measured in number of 16 bit words ie 1 word = 2 bytes.

This parameter has been specifically chosen for aptX low latency to provide the best performance.

Do not change it unless you are very sure what you are doing.

Recommended value - 1000 words

property.name: Good Working Buffer Level
property.description:
Set the Good Working Buffer Level

Input codec buffer level required before decoding starts.

This parameter has been specifically chosen for aptX low latency to provide the best performance.

Do not change it unless you are very sure what you are doing.

Recommended value - 0.125 (12.5% of the buffer size)

property.name: Debug mode
property.description:
Set application debug mode

Specify whether the application is in debug mode. Note this does not necessarily mean the libraries will be in debug mode. However if any library debug features are to be used it must be set.
